amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the National Estuary program by $33.9 million and decrease NASA funding accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the appropriation for Environmental Programs and Management by $33,900,000 from $1,900,000,000 to $1,933,900,000 by reducing the appropriation for Mission Support under NASA by $33,900,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Saxton amendment (A015) Failed by voice vote.
